name: Department of Soul Traders
description:
Congratulations, you are dead! But wait, there's been a mix up! 

You don't belong in Hell, you need to get to Heaven.

Find the Grimm Raper to sign you off for a Heaven transfer before Lucifer catches you and damns you for eternity!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Winner of a 7 hour game jam based on the theme Bureaucracy

Programming: Ben Guiden

Art: Alex Cahill

Sound: Kevin Tuite
